attributes.action: action the removal of the petition that has been raised to prosecute the parents of Maddy McCann
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is not a legitimate cause; it is a witch hunt, though no one agrees with the McCanns descision to leave Maddy alone in that room on that evening; the fact that she was snatched was not their fault, they will have to live with the consequences of having some alone time for the rest of their lives. 
Prosecuting them will not bring her back and will only cause them and the other children in their family more misery

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
